library.message: Clean Environment
Very quiet, enjoy studying in the silent space with sound-insulated walls
I love the friendly people there. Everyone's quiet.
As an Asian, got quite amazed by that! Worth to have a visit there!
Good Environment with lots of books, giving rise to your soul to study here!
Provides gym equipments and great hardware like IMac! Great learning experience!
Center of the school! Also 5 star recommended due to the always-extended period before final.
I always got amazed by the view in front of me when looking outside the window!
This is really by far the most popular library! That being said, it is sometimes hard to find seat and I personally found it noisy as you sit near the center area outside the Ridingson!
Takes time to work up there, but overall I recommend sitting in the Ridingson, which is super duper quiet as always!
Very beautiful at night as the light in the tower is flashing! Perfect to take a walk to release some stress after a long studying session!
Sometimes people do tutoring and start to get noisy downstairs.
Pretty dark inside, and almost no charging areas provided. Even 0/5 is too high.
Amazing View outside the front door!
Is close to Rose Garden and is close to most of my Econ classes, which are held in Buchanan building.
Too far from main mall! If you take bus, it will be an okay choice
Very very great environment to have discussion! 5 star rating worth it!
Nice Archetecture! Comfy studying spots with sliding chairs and lots of sofas!
Love the two lecture halls but would rather studying far from it.
Dirty washroom! Seems like people are smoking in here, but space is bright and comfy for long-time studying
Perfect for Arts students who have classes nearby that area. Also it's close to the bus loop and restaurants in university blvd. Best choice ever!
Very new building, think they are still expanding it. Can' wait to see what it'll look like after a couple of years!
quiet small and looks like SFU, which has a design of a jail.
